tweet: The biggest threats for crypto: -Mining will be forbidden -Anonymity will be forbidden -Fees prevent adoption -Lack of scalability prevents adoption -No unique use-cases -Quantum computing -The industry is not interested #IOTA has none of these problems.  #bitcoin #ethereum #XRP

#IOTA is a feeless transaction system, and there’s a reason for it: Monetization is unsuitable for #IoT micropayments. Transacting on IOTA is free. It is how you implement it in your business model that really matters.   #altcoins #crypto #cryptocurrency

#IOTA may not be trader’s favorite because the majority of #crypto trading is driven by short-term gains, while IOTA’s strengths lie in its long-term potential. Among the good-performing, high-quality projects, IOTA’s had one of the worst price performances this year.   #altcoins

Hey guys, I am departing from the #IOTA Foundation. I hugely enjoyed my time there and learned a lot on the way. I am leaving in order to spend more time on my studies. I'm still good with the Foundation, wish them all the best and will keep watching the amazing progress unfold.

@DanSimerman @MarkMEberstein To second what @DanSimerman said. The token is a completely separate function from the data capability. The #CIO doesnt have to worry about the token to begin using #IOTA. They can just use it for its data capabilities first and use the token as a function down the road.
